name: Finka

biography.description: Finka's Adrenal Surge activates pre-injected nanobots, providing a temporary boost in HP, reviving downed allies, and steadying aim.

gameplayTips: Use Adrenal Surge to revive downed teammates and provide a health boost during engagements.
Coordinate with teammates to maximize the impact of the ability.
Be mindful of the cooldown and use it strategically in critical moments.
